doc.title: Blank Background / Let us use on more than one mobile device please.
doc.text: This app is really good for keeping in touch with folks in other countries. Every day or so the chat log is just blank, it only shows my background. Rebooting doesn't help, but sometimes it comes back if I just let it sit there and wait an hour or so. This is a major inconvenience as you can imagine as you cannot read incoming messages. The downside to this app is there really isn't any support since its not based in the US. I would also like this app to work on multiple devices (Phone/ Tablet) with the same account.

doc.title: Something wrong w Notification pop out

And when i tap 'view' on the pop out to enter the app, the message disappeared. This happened many atimes.. gonna uninstall and install to see how it goes.. other than that, great app.

doc.title: Horrible navigation within the app.
doc.text: - It does not follow best UI practices. - UI looks very much iOSish. - Even buttons do not have Android look and feel. - Navigation is horrible. I had hard time trying to find friends and then start a chat with them. - The UI is a fail combination of twitter and Facebook. They might have started well with designing the UI and then got carried over. - [Suggestion]: Make the navigation simpler. Use either stock images or your own custom ones to make the app look more Androidish which will give the application a soul.

doc.title: Best medium for expressing more than words

Love the various free stickers that come from time to time too. However, to improve UI during chat, maybe u could have more than one column from our selection sticker icons. doc.title: Disappearing text
doc.text: No doubt this application is easy to use and very user-friendly.. but there is one problem which keeps occurring.. if there is an alert on new text received.. the text that suppose to be there will be gone.. the same thing happened when I try to share any picture to the chat room.. its getting worse.. I thought the problem came from my phone.. it turn out to be some of my friends are facing the same problem.. I hope future updates will include ways to solve this.. other than that.. everything is cool..

doc.title: Amazing Application
doc.text: I love this application! Everything about it is wonderful, from the free voice and video calls to the stickers you can use in your conversations. It's perfect for having a full content conversation with somebody (text, as well as images and voice messages). Best of all, everything is free. Consider this app as similar to Facebook messaging, only much much better. I have a single grievance, and it's completely overshadowed by all the positives. You are unable to have a conversation going on two devices at the same time (i.e. a phone and a tablet). In order to switch from the phone to the tablet, you have to log out, and then log in on the tablet, and vice versa. It would be incredibly useful if you could be logged into both simultaneously, and this ability would only add to this incredible application. Overall, I would definitely suggest this app, and I sure hope they add that ability! Five stars, definitely!

Overall, LINE is a very great and complete messenger for me. And their breakthrough is definitely the best so far. Have fun with LINE. :)

doc.title: Age Verification
doc.text: Have been using Line for yrars & loving it. However, recently it crashed and I had to reinstall it losing lots of contacts in the process but the most annoying this is this Age Verification. I installed Line in one country and am now in another so it's not allowing me to verify my age which means I can't search for friends by ID or even make my ID public. Extremely frustrating and annoying

doc.title: LINE is a MESS
doc.text: LINE used to function very well. NOW, LINE is an annoying technical disaster. 1. It forces you to use a screwed up and inconvenient age verification system. Which results in many people having to visit their mobile phone company. 2. It doesn't use the names YOU have for people in your contacts. It uses their LINE names. Thus causing confusion as to who people are. 3. LINE doesn't listen to it's customers.

doc.title: No support for different kind of devices
doc.text: I really love line. And as long as I had only my Galaxy Note 2 (phone) I didn't really have much of a complaint. When I bought my Nexus 7 (tablet) I realized I couldn't use the same account to both. I can maybe understand not allowing multiple phone devices. In that case at least provide the same connectivity you have for PCs to tablets too! This is purely the reason for the 3 stars!
